books.author: by Adam Schiff
books.description: The congressman from California describes risks to our democracy and the resurgence of autocracy.
books.name: MIDNIGHT IN WASHINGTON

books.author: by Bret Baier with Catherine Whitney
books.description: The Fox News chief political anchor recounts challenges faced by Ulysses S. Grant.
books.name: TO RESCUE THE REPUBLIC

books.author: by Dave Grohl
books.description: A memoir by the musician known for his work with Foo Fighters and Nirvana.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Ron Howard and Clint Howard
books.description: The Howard brothers credit their success in Hollywood to their Midwestern parents, Rance and Jean.
books.name: THE BOYS

books.author: by Bob Woodward and Robert Costa
books.description: The Washington Post journalists detail the dangers and challenges during the transition to the Biden presidency.
books.name: PERIL

books.author: by James Patterson and Matt Eversmann with Chris Mooney
books.description: A collection of stories from people working in big-city and small-town hospitals.
books.name: E.R. NURSES

books.author: by Anderson Cooper and Katherine Howe
books.description: The CNN host and descendant of the Vanderbilt family charts the rise and fall of this American dynasty.
books.name: VANDERBILT

books.author: by the Beatles
books.description: The story of the making of the band’s final album, gathered from transcripts of their conversations.
books.name: THE BEATLES: GET BACK

books.author: by Seth Wickersham
books.description: The ESPN reporter traces the inner workings of the New England Patriots and their influence on the N.F.L. over two decades.
books.name: IT'S BETTER TO BE FEARED

books.author: by Stanley Tucci
books.description: The award-winning actor reflects on his career, Italian-American heritage, meals and mishaps.
books.name: TASTE

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The Fox News host gives his take on the Green New Deal, critical race theory and social activism.
books.name: AMERICAN MARXISM

books.author: by Fiona Hill
books.description: The foreign policy expert traces her life from being a coal miner’s daughter in northern England to her testimony in the first impeachment inquiry of former President Trump.
books.name: THERE IS NOTHING FOR YOU HERE

books.author: by Stephanie Land
books.description: An unexpected pregnancy forces the author to navigate challenges faced by the working poor.
books.name: MAID

books.author: by Nick Offerman
books.description: The actor and humorist shares stories and observations from three quests taken in the outdoors.
books.name: WHERE THE DEER AND THE ANTELOPE PLAY
